title: Patch Update Constantly Failing
body:
Hello, this is my first time actually using these forums but I haven't received a response to my support ticket and I'm becoming slightly impatient. 

The client was working perfectly fine, until the latest patch released and I had to update it. I have tried countless times, but there seems to be absolutely no way of letting this patch work. I've used the Repair tool as instructed. I've done a clean uninstall of the entire client _(multiple times)_. I'm kind of at a loss of options. Everything worked completely fine as far as the client goes for the past few months, and I just can't seem to find a way to fix it. 

Any suggestions?

replies.body: It looks like you're trying to update to the new client, but for some reason League isn't able to scan the game files in order to see what needs to be updated. Let's make sure that your pc has all the right [**permissions set up**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) first, and let me know if you're still not able to get that update going!

Hi Broporo, 

I had the newest client previously before uninstalling League, and this problem still persisted. I've gotten all of the permissions setup correctly, however the download will fail as soon as it gets to the patch downloads.

That's pretty odd =\ . Let's go ahead and get you in touch with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they might be able to help with getting you a different way to try installing the client.
It was fixed! Had to perform an entire clean re-installation but nonetheless i'm back in the realm. Thanks anyways!
